content.text:
# Filmfare Award for Best Female Debut â€“ Marathi

The Filmfare Award for Best Female Debut is given by Filmfare as part of its annual Filmfare Awards for Marathi Cinemas to recognise a performance by a female actor in a debut role. Each individual entry shows the title followed by the production company and the producer.
Winners and nominees
2010s
